abstract: The package of commercial agreements comes days after BP won approval to buy stakes in oil and gas blocks owned by Reliance Industries of India.
snippet: The package of commercial agreements comes days after BP won approval to buy stakes in oil and gas blocks owned by Reliance Industries of India.
lead_paragraph: Britain and India will unveil about £1 billion ($1.6 billion) in commercial deals, days after BP, the oil giant, won approval to buy $7.2 billion in stakes in oil and natural gas blocks owned by Reliance Industries of India.

headline.main: British Reach Deal Package With India
headline.print_headline: British Reach Deal Package With India
